content:
As an AI language model, I do not have specific product recommendations, but here are some popular mesh networking devices and routers that support beamforming:

Mesh Networking Devices:
- Google Nest Wifi
- Amazon Eero Mesh WiFi System
- Netgear Orbi Mesh WiFi System
- Linksys Velop Mesh WiFi System
- TP-Link Deco Mesh WiFi System

Routers with Beamforming:
- NETGEAR Nighthawk X10 AD7200 802.11ac/ad Quad-Stream WiFi Router
- ASUS RT-AC88U AC3100 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Gaming Router
- TP-Link Archer C5400 AC5400 Tri-Band MU-MIMO Gigabit Router
- Linksys WRT3200ACM AC3200 MU-MIMO Gigabit Wi-Fi Router

These devices are just a few examples that support mesh networking or beamforming. It's recommended that you do some research and read some reviews before purchasing a device to ensure it meets your specific needs.
